Complete Your First Project in R
Exploring Customer Data

```{r}
#run first
library(xlsx)
library(dplyr)
customers <- read.xlsx("/Users/megansilvey/Documents/LinkedIn Learning/R Project Course/Red30 Tech Customers.xlsx",1)
```

```{r}
#get count of years by number of customers 
customers %>% count(DateCustAdded, sort = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#review customer states when customers were added
table(customers$CustState, customers$DateCustAdded)
```

```{r}
#sort data by date customer added, newest customer
customers[order(customers$DateCustAdded, decreasing = TRUE), ]
```

```{r}
#sort data by date customer added, oldest customers
customers[order(customers$DateCustAdded, decreasing = FALSE), ]
```
